alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:29AM CDT until July 09 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Eastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of El Reno, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Western Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, and Richland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
